About BTVWAG

A place for technology enthusiasts focused on web development to come together and share ideas. We a. See our past events for a list of previous topics.

Get updates

As soon as we can, we'll get a mailing list going. For now, follow us via twitter or github.

MiddWAG is organized by Nate Beatty. Please contact us with any questions or comments.
